name: Mad Martians
description: A simple space shooter game. Use the mouse to move and shoot. P to pause the game. You have to die to get to the quit menu... I'll change that lol.  I'm currently enrolled as an apprentice at GameDevHQ. This is the current project I'm working on. I will say it does not run the same on WebGL as it does on PC. The aspect ratio may be a little weird but plays fine in full screen.  Please feel free to leave feedback and have fun!
